watchanalytics-personal-url:
Display text for page specific URL. Parameters: 
* $1 - page title
watchanalytics-personal-url-approvals:
Display text for page specific approval URLs. Parameters: 
* $1 - page title
* $2 - approvals
watchanalytics-personal-url-old:
Reviews count and respective days count. Parameters:
* $1 - reviews count
* $2 - days count
watchanalytics-personal-url-approvals-ol:
Reviews count, days count and approvals count for page. Parameters:
* $1 - reviews count
* $2 - days count
* $3 - approvals count
clearpendingreviews: Display text for clearing pending reviews
clearpendingreview-category: Display text for page category selection
clearpendingreview-start-time: Display text for start time selection
clearpendingreview-end-time: Display text for end time selection
clearpendingreviews-date-order-invalid: Error message when end date is before start date
clearpendingreviews-missing-date-categor: Error message for invalid input type (except category or title)
clearpendingreviews-success:
Success message after clearing pending reviews
Parameters:
* $1 - number of pages
clearpendingreviews-people-impacted: Display title for impacted people list
clearform-section1: Display text for time period selection
watchanalytics-user-group-no-filter: Display text for no group filter
watchanalytics-category-no-filter: Display text for no category filter
watchanalytics-special-header-watches: Display text for number of watches
watchanalytics-special-header-pending-wa: Display text for number of pending watches
watchanalytics-special-header-reviewed-w: Display text for number of reviewed watches
watchanalytics-special-header-pending-ma: Display text for max pending time
watchanalytics-special-header-pending-av: Display text for average pending time
watchanalytics-special-header-num-pages: Display text for number of pages
watchanalytics-special-header-num-unwatc: Display text for number of unwatched pages
watchanalytics-special-header-num-one-wa: Display text for number of pages watched once
watchanalytics-special-header-num-unrevi: Display text for number of unreviewed pages
watchanalytics-special-header-num-one-re: Display text for number of pages reviewed once
watchanalytics-special-header-main-num-p: Display text for number of content pages
watchanalytics-special-header-main-watch: Display text for number of content watches
watchanalytics-special-header-main-pendi: Display text for number of pending content watches
Display text for number of max pending time (content pages)
Display text for number of average pending time (content pages)
watchanalytics-special-header-main-num-u: Display text for number of content unwatched
watchanalytics-special-header-main-num-o: Display text for number of content watched once
watchanalytics-special-header-main-num-u: Display text for number of content unreviewed
watchanalytics-special-header-main-num-o: Display text for number of content reviewed once
watchanalytics-pendingreviews-diff-revis:
View page link. Parameter:
* $1 - number of changes
pendingreviews-timediff-days:
Changed days difference text. Parameter:
* $1 - number of days
pendingreviews-timediff-hours:
Changed hours difference text. Parameter:
* $1 - number of hours
pendingreviews-timediff-minutes:
Changed minutes difference text. Parameter:
* $1 - number of minutes
pendingreviews-no-revisions: Display text when there are no changes
pendingreviews-num-reviews:
Display text for number of pending reviews. Parameter:
* $1 - number of reviews
pendingreviews-num-other-user-reviews:
Display text for number of pending reviews for a user. Parameters:
* $1 - username
* $2 - number of reviews
pendingreviews-num-approvals:
Display text for number of pending approvals for a user. Parameters:
* $1 - username
* $2 - number of approvals
pendingreviews-reviewer-criticality-dang:
Display text for number of reviewers. Parameter:
* $1 - number of reviewers
pendingreviews-reviewer-criticality-gene:
Display text for one or more reviewers. Parameter:
* $1 - number of reviewers
watchanalytics-pagestats-editors-list-it:
Display text for number of revisions per page. Parameters:
* $1 - page title
* $2 - number of revisions
watchanalytics-pagestats-watchers-list-i:
Display text for latest reviewed page. Parameter:
* $1 - page title

Display text for number of pending reviews per page. Parameter:
* $1 - page title
watchanalytics-pagestats-chart-header: Display text for number of reviewers over time
watchanalytics-unreview-banner-text: Banner text for page getting reviewed when visited
watchanalytics-unreview-complete: Banner text for page unreview completion
pendingreviews-pending-approvedrev-title:
Display text for revision approval. Parameter:
* $1 - revision title
pendingreviews-edited-by:
Display text for edit made without summary by user. Parameter:
* $1 - username
pendingreviews-with-comment:
Display text for edit made with summary by user. Parameter:
* $1 - username
pendingreviews-page-deleted:
Deleted page text. Parameter:
* $1 - page title
pendingreviews-page-moved-no-redirect:
Moved page text. Parameter:
* $1 - page title
pendingreviews-page-deleted-talk:
Display text for asking page deletion. Parameter:
* $1 - page title
pendingreviews-clear-page-notification:
Display text for page marked reviewed. Parameters:
* $1 - reviewed page title
* $2 - next page title
pendingreviews-log-approved:
Log entry for revision approval. Parameter:
* $1 - username
pendingreviews-log-unapproved:
Log entry for unapproving all revisions. Parameter:
* $1 - username
pendingreviews-log-delete:
Log entry for page deletion with rationale. Parameters: $1 - username
* $2 - page title
pendingreviews-log-restore:
Log entry for page undeletion. Parameter:
* $1 - username
pendingreviews-log-import-upload:
Log entry for page upload. Parameter:
* $1 - username
pendingreviews-log-move:
Log entry for page move. Parameter:
* $1 - old page title
* $2 - new page title
pendingreviews-log-move-redir:
Log entry for page redirect. Parameter:
* $1 - original page title
* $2 - redirected page title
pendingreviews-log-protect:
Log entry for page protection addition. Parameter:
* $1 - username
pendingreviews-log-unprotect:
Log entry for page protection removal. Parameter:
* $1 - username
pendingreviews-log-modify-protect:
Log entry for page protection modification. Parameter:
* $1 - username
pendingreviews-log-upload-new:
Log entry for initial file upload. Parameter:
* $1 - username
pendingreviews-log-upload-overwrite:
Log entry for new file version upload. Parameter:
* $1 - username
pendingreviews-log-unknown-change:
Log entry for unknown change. Parameter:
* $1 - username
logentry-pendingreviews-clearreivews:
Display text for cleared pending reviews. Parameters:
* $1 - username
* $2 - gender
* $3 - criteria
* $4 - number of reviews
* $5 - page title
pendingreviews-watch-suggestion-title: Display text for page watch suggestion
pendingreviews-approve-revs-title:
Display text for pages needing the user approval. Parameter:
* $1 - number of pages
